scripts.build: npm run build:common && npm run build:s1 && npm run build:s2
scripts.build:s1: npm run b:clo && npm run b:fle && npm run b:fli && npm run b:tab && npm run b:tac && npm run b:tap && npm run b:inf
scripts.build:s2: npm run b:car && npm run b:cai && npm run b:inp && npm run b:pop && npm run b:pia && npm run b:pid && npm run b:pir
scripts.b:clo: vue-cli-service build --target lib --name clocker --dest lib/clocker --no-clean src/async/clocker.js
scripts.b:fle: vue-cli-service build --target lib --name flex --dest lib/flex --no-clean src/async/flex.js
scripts.b:fli: vue-cli-service build --target lib --name flex-item --dest lib/flex-item --no-clean src/async/flex-item.js
scripts.b:tab: vue-cli-service build --target lib --name tab --dest lib/tab --no-clean src/async/tab.js
scripts.b:tac: vue-cli-service build --target lib --name tab-container --dest lib/tab-container --no-clean src/async/tab-container.js
scripts.b:tap: vue-cli-service build --target lib --name tab-pane --dest lib/tab-pane --no-clean src/async/tab-pane.js
scripts.b:inf: vue-cli-service build --target lib --name infinite-scroll --dest lib/infinite-scroll --no-clean src/async/infinite-scroll.js
scripts.b:car: vue-cli-service build --target lib --name carousel --dest lib/carousel --no-clean src/async/carousel.js
scripts.b:cai: vue-cli-service build --target lib --name carousel-item --dest lib/carousel-item --no-clean src/async/carousel-item.js
scripts.b:inp: vue-cli-service build --target lib --name input --dest lib/input --no-clean src/async/input.js
scripts.b:pop: vue-cli-service build --target lib --name popup --dest lib/popup --no-clean src/async/popup.js
scripts.b:pia: vue-cli-service build --target lib --name picker-address --dest lib/picker-address --no-clean src/async/picker-address.js
scripts.b:pid: vue-cli-service build --target lib --name picker-datetime --dest lib/picker-datetime --no-clean src/async/picker-datetime.js
scripts.b:pir: vue-cli-service build --target lib --name picker-range --dest lib/picker-range --no-clean src/async/picker-range.js
